M

Merge - Class in mz
Merge Sort is a comparison-based sorting algorithm that follows the divide-and-conquer approach.
Merge() - Constructor for class mz.Merge
Merge Sort:
Is a comparison-based sorting algorithm that follows the divide-and-conquer approach.
MERGE_THRESHOLD - Variable in class mz.MergeInsertion
The threshold value for when to switch from merge sort to insertion sort.
Merge3 - Class in mz
Merge3 Sort the sorting process is divided into three parts and performed incrementally.
Merge3() - Constructor for class mz.Merge3
Merge3 Sort:
The sorting process is divided into three parts and performed incrementally.

MergeInPlace - Class in mz
Merge In Place Sort is a variant of the merge sort algorithm that performs the sorting operation directly on the input array, without using any additional arrays for merging.
MergeInPlace() - Constructor for class mz.MergeInPlace
Merge In Place Sort:
Is a variant of the merge sort algorithm that performs the sorting operation directly on the input array, without using any additional arrays for merging.
MergeInsertion - Class in mz
Merge Insertion Sort or the Ford–Johnson algorithm is a comparison sorting algorithm.
MergeInsertion() - Constructor for class mz.MergeInsertion
Merge Insertion Sort:
Merge Insertion Sort or the Ford–Johnson algorithm is a comparison sorting algorithm.
mergeInsertionDec(Comparable[]) - Method in class mz.MergeInsertion
